# Claude Agent Setup

## Dev environment tips
- Use your package manager (`pnpm`, `npm`, etc.) to manage dependencies for Claude tasks.
- Ensure you have access to the Claude API (see [Anthropic docs](https://docs.anthropic.com/claude)).
- Confirm agent config name and environment variables.

## Testing instructions
- Use Claude-enabled test runners, or mock the Claude API for local tests.
- Follow normal project test routines.

## PR instructions
- Title format: [Claude] <Title>
- Run all lint, type check, and test commands before committing.
